task_description: Fix all 25+ issues identified by 10-critic review: CRITICAL (stock reservation, race conditions, tenant isolation, order cancellation, discount limits, refund webhook, build errors, file validation, cart stock check, font loading), HIGH (N+1 queries, indexes, caching, loading states, error messages, pagination, retry logic, webhook handling), MEDIUM (404 pages, analytics, search, emails, validation, console.log, test coverage)
